{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config":{"_active":"on","created":"20140913215723814","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140923134103805","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_popuptagger $:/_macros","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/TagBar"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage":{"created":"20140913163723059","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140922055743981","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_popuptagger $:/_UI","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define if-match-else(A,B,C="",D,E) <$reveal type="match" state="$A$" text=$B$ default=$C$> $D$ <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$A$" text=$B$ default=$C$> $E$ \end \define if-matchB-blank-default(A,B,C="",D) <$reveal type="match" state="$A$" text="$B$" default=""> $D$ \end * `**` In this tiddler, all PopupTagger(s) are displayed (view filters are ignored). <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" type="nomatch" text="off" default=""> ~PopupTagger ''Enabled'' <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" type="match" text="off" default=""> ~PopupTagger `Disabled` <>

Available ~PopupTagger(s)

<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]tag[$:/_popuptagger]]" > <$list filter="_debug _active _edittag _tagtable _tagpopup"] variable="field">
Debug Active Tag
Edit		 Tag
Table		 Tag
Bar

~PopupTagger(s) <$button message="tm-new-tiddler" param="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/TagBar">Add

<$checkbox field=<> checked="on" unchecked="off" default="on"/>

<$radio tiddler="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config" value={{!!title}}/> <$link to={{!!title}}><$text text={{!!title}}/> <$macrocall $name="if-matchB-blank-default" A="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config" B={{!!title}} D="
@@color:red;=>@@ Configure as below" /> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config" text={{!!title}} default="">
Parent Tags : ''<$view field="taggroup"/>''
View Filter : ''<$view field="view-filter"/>''
List After : ''<$view field="list-after"/>''


<$list filter="[title{$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config}]" >

Configure ~PopupTagger -- [ <$text text={{!!title}}/> ]

  • Parent Tags : ''<$view field="taggroup"/>'' <$linkcatcher message="tm-navigate" set=<> setTo="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/tab-taggroup"> <$button set="$:/temp/pptg-taggroup!!tags" setTo={{!!taggroup}} to=<> >Verify
    • <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/tab-taggroup" default=""> config with <$button set=<> setTo="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/tab-taggroup"> Parent Tags tab below <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/tab-taggroup" default=""> new value -- <@@ -- <$list filter="[{$:/temp/pptg-taggroup!!tags}regexp[\S]first[]]" variable="text1"> <$button set="!!taggroup" setTo={{$:/temp/pptg-taggroup!!tags}}>Proceed """>>

  • View Filter : ''<$text text={{!!view-filter}}/>'' <$linkcatcher message="tm-navigate" set=<> setTo="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"> <$button set="$:/temp/advancedsearch" setTo={{!!view-filter}} to=<> >Verify
    • <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter" default=""> config and verify with <$button set=<> setTo="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter"> Filter tab below <$reveal type="match" state=<> text="$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter" default=""> new value -- < <$button set="!!view-filter" setTo={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}>Proceed """>>

  • Location -- list after : <$select field="list-after" default=""> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]] -[[$(pptg-tool-base)$]]">
<>"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/history":{"caption":"History","created":"20140905163101231","creator":"EucalyJ","lastupdate":"20141004","modified":"20141004021938843","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_readme $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/history","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!!!History * 20141004 / ''0.1.4'' ** add `Verify` button for Parent Tags in [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] ** fix `New Tag` button when parent tag contains `!` * 20140921 / update icons * 20140914 / ''0.1.3'' ( 32K / 17.8K ) ** Global switch `<>` ** Reshape with central [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] ** No need user-provided "pptg-tool-base" ** ==== coding details ==== ** only necessary macros are global ** `InPlace.js` -- extended from TitleMe * 20140913 / ''0.1.2'' ( 24K / 11.4K ) -- for 5.0.17-beta ~ ** stylesheet tagged with {{$:/tags/Stylesheet||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} ** sync ''~TagBar'' / ''~TagTable'' with the same column layout ** add "edit button" for child tag ** change to <$button to="" class=<>> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} [[$:/core/images/options-button]] ** show PopupTagger config in one place ** ==== coding details ==== ** Change ButtonWidget `title` attribute to `tooltip` ** reduce `<$list>` use ** use `listItem` to detect body / tagbar ** use `storyTiddler`, `transclusion`, `listItem` variable for debug * 20140908 / ''0.1.1'' ( 14.8K / 10.2K ) ** Add ''~TagTable'' ** `<>` provides handy setup process ** Each element can be enabled / disabled * 20140906 / ''0.0.1'' ( 4.5K / 2.2K ) -- not released ** `<>` -- global for all tiddlers ** `<>` -- selective, but might need some tweak for filter setup * 20140905 -- working draft "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/icon":{"created":"20140921105653585","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140921105712528","modifier":"EucalyJ","ref":"tagx3-ON.svg","tags":"$:/tags/Image $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/img/tagOn","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"{{$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/icon}}"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/inplace.js":{"created":"20140913152220978","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140913154217527","modifier":"EucalyJ","module-type":"macro","tags":"$:/_js $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/inplace.js","type":"application/javascript","text":"/*\ $:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/inplace.js type: application/javascript module-type: macro !!! Feature This InPlace macro returns in-place field vaule of source tiddler (even in a transclude hierarchy) !!! Usage <> * returns the field vaule of source tiddler * default field is title \*/ (function(){ /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ "use strict"; exports.name = "InPlace"; exports.params = [{ name: "fieldName" } ]; /* Run the macro */ exports.run = function(fieldName) { var output = "", variable_name = "transclusion", meRegex = /\{[^|]*\|([^|]*)\|/, p = this, v0 = ""; while (p) { var v = p.getVariable(variable_name); if ( v && v!=v0 ) { var match = meRegex.exec(v); if (match && match.length>1) { output = match[1]; if (fieldName) { var tiddler = this.wiki.getTiddler(output); if(tiddler) { output = tiddler.getFieldString(fieldName); } } break; } } p = p.parentWidget; } return output; }; })();"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros/auto":{"created":"20140907013822226","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140914012228717","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros/auto","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define pptg-debug(src) <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!_debug" text="off" default="on"> ^^<$link to="" tooltip=<> >me <$link to="" tooltip=<> >story <$link to="" tooltip=<> >current <$link to="" tooltip=<">> >trans <$link to="" tooltip=<> >listItem^^ $src$ \end \define pptg-tagbar() <$reveal type="match" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!title" text=<> default=""> <@@^^""">> <> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!title" text=<> default=""> <^^""">> <$reveal type="match" state="!!title" text="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage" default=""> <> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!title" text="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage" default=""> <> \end \define pptg-body() <$reveal type="match" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!title" text=<> default="">

This is a __~PopupTagger tiddler__, you can visit [[PopupTagger ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] to check the configuration.

<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!title" text=<> default=""> <> \end \define pptg-tool-base-warning() <">> @@color:red;There's something wrong with ~popupTagger ...@@
  • `pptg-tool-base` -- <>
  • while `new title` -- <>
\end"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros/render":{"created":"20140914011146334","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20141004020308447","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros/render","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define pptg-tagPopup() <$button popup=<> tooltip="Select tags" class="tc-btn-invisible"> â–¼ $(tagG)$ <$reveal type=popup state=<> >
<>
\end \define pptg-tagColumn()

$(tagG)$ ( <$count filter="[[$(tagG)$]tagging[]!prefix[$:/temp]!has[draft.of]]"/> )

<$list filter="[tag[$(tagG)$]!prefix[$:/temp]!has[draft.of]sort[]]" variable="tagA"> <$button message="tm-edit-tiddler" param=<> class=<>> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$checkbox tiddler="$(currentTiddler)$" tag=<>> <>
<$list filter="[[$(tagG)$]regexp:title[!]]" variable="test3" emptyMessage="""<$button set="new $(tagG)$ tag!!tags" setTo="$(tagG)$">New Tag"""> <$button set="new tag!!tags" setTo="$(tagG)$">New Tag

\end \define pptg-render()
<$reveal type="match" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!title" text={{!!title}} default=""> @@color:red;=>@@ <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage!!title" text=<> default=""> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config" text="$(pptg-tool-base)$" default=""> @@color:red;=>@@ <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!_active" text="off" default="on"> <$linkcatcher message="tm-navigate" set="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config" setTo=<> > <$button to="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage" tooltip="Config PopupTagger - $(pptg-tool-base)$" class=<> > {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!_edittag" text="off" default="on"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/state/popuptagger/EditTags" text=<> default=""> <$button set="$:/state/popuptagger/EditTags" setTo=<> tooltip="Edit tags">Edit Tags <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/popuptagger/EditTags" text=<> default=""> <$button tooltip="Hide tags" set="$:/state/popuptagger/EditTags" setTo="">Hide Tags / <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!_tagtable" text="off" default="on"> <> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!_tagpopup" text="off" default="on"> <$list filter=<> variable="tagG"> <> <$reveal type="nomatch" state="$(pptg-tool-base)$!!_edittag" text="off" default="on"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/state/popuptagger/EditTags" text=<> default="">

<$edit field="tags"/>

\end \define pptg-tagTable() <$reveal type=popup state=<> >
<$list filter=<> variable="tagG">
<>
<$button popup=<> tooltip="Tag Table">Tag Table \end"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros":{"created":"20140905060129591","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140914024929144","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_popuptagger $:/tags/Macro","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\define PopupTagger() <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" type="nomatch" text="off" default=""> <$importvariables filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros/]]"> <$set name="pptg-tool-base" value=<> > <> \end \define PopupTaggerIf() <$list filter=<> variable="t1"> <$list filter="[is[current]!has[draft.of]first[]]" variable="t2"> <> \end \define PopupTaggerAuto() <$importvariables filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]prefix[$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/macros/]]"> <$set name="pptg-tool-base" value=<> > <$list filter="[title!field:title]" variable="test14">
<> <>
<$list filter="[titlefield:title]" variable="test23">
<> <>
\end \define PopupTaggerSwitch() <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" type="nomatch" text="off" default=""> <$button set="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" setTo="off" tooltip="Hide PopupTagger" class=<> >{{$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/img/tagOn}} <$reveal state="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" type="match" text="off" default=""> <$button set="$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/config!!_active" setTo="on" tooltip="Show PopupTagger" class=<> >{{$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/img/tagOff}} \end "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/readme":{"caption":"~PopupTagger","created":"20140905151516651","creator":"EucalyJ","lastupdate":"20141004","modified":"20141004021911667","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_readme $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/readme","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!![[PopupTagger Plugin|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/readme]]
This ''PopupTagger'' plugin provides ''~TagTable'' and ''~TagBar with popup list of tags'' for [[TiddlyWiki 5|http://tiddlywiki.com/]].

** Inspired by [[MonkeyTaggerMacro|http://tiddlywiki.squize.org/#MonkeyTaggerMacro]] (~TiddlyWiki classic)

!!!Features # ''~TagBar'' with ''popup list of tags'' # ''~TagTable'' for quick tagging # ''~TagEdit'' enables ''tag editing'' as in ~TiddlyWiki classic # Shortcut <$button class=<>> {{$:/core/images/options-button}} for ''~PopupTagger'' setting # ''Global switch'' `<>` <> # ''Handy setup process'' -- central [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] #* Each element can be enabled / disabled #* ''Custom parent tags'' to generate ''~TagBar'' and ''~TagTable'' #* ~PopupTagger could be ''selectively available'' for certain tiddlers only -- thanks to `<$list>` filter #* ''Custom ~PopupTagger location'' -- thanks to `list-after` field # ** all above tag operations is ''real-time'' in ''View Mode'' !!!Install * Drag&Drop package -- [[$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger]] (with documentation) !!!Usage * You may start with some tag trees like : <<< {{$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/img/tag-tree.png}} <<< # Goto central [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] ( [[$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] ) # Check for available ~PopupTagger, or # Press `Add` button #* Rename the new ~PopupTagger tiddler, in order not to overwrite the [[PopupTagger template|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/TagBar]] #* ~~Modify `\define pptg-tool-base()` macro definition to sync with the new title~~ #* ~~In addition to that,~~ please keep `<>` macro call there. # Follow the `Configure` section provided in [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]] # ''Global switch'' `<>` <> is available in [[ControlPage|$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/ControlPage]], and can be added to else where as you like. * ** If you like to conduct a ''manual setup'', you may try `<>` or `<>` macro call, instead of `<>` !!!Filter Example |

[tag[`$:/_readme`]] [tag[`$:/_UI`]]

|tagged `$:/_readme` or `$:/_UI` | |

[tag[`$:/_macros`]tag[`$:/_popuptagger`]]

|tagged `$:/_macros` and `$:/_popuptagger` | |

[creator/`eucaly`/(i)]

|with creator name contains `eucaly` | "},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/StyleSheet":{"created":"20140906125324508","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140912233930702","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet $:/_popuptagger $:/_macros","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/StyleSheet","type":"text/css","text":".tc-popuptagger { background-color: #eee; } .tc-tiddler-body .tc-popuptagger { display:none; } .tc-popuptagger-body { display:none; } .tc-tiddler-body .tc-popuptagger-body { display:inline; } .tc-popuptagger-body input { width: 60% } .tc-popuptagger-checked { background-color: #8f8; }"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/tab-taggroup":{"caption":"Parent Tags","created":"20140907071901381","creator":"EucalyJ","modified":"20140914012411928","modifier":"EucalyJ","tags":"$:/_macros $:/_popuptagger","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/tab-taggroup","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"!!!!Parent Tags <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tags[]tags[]]">
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/temp/pptg-taggroup" tag={{!!title}}/> {{!!title}} ( <$count filter="[{!!title}tagging[]!prefix[$:/temp]!has[draft.of]]"/> )
or edit in below -- <$button set="$:/temp/pptg-taggroup!!tags" setTo="">Clear {{$:/temp/pptg-taggroup||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/tags}} <$edit tiddler="$:/temp/pptg-taggroup" field="tags"/> If below result looks OK, please press `Proceed` above. <$list filter="[list[$:/temp/pptg-taggroup!!tags]]">

''{{!!title}}'' ( <$count filter="[{!!title}tagging[]!prefix[$:/temp]]"/> )

<$list filter="[{!!title}tagging[]!prefix[$:/temp]sort[]]"> {{!!title}}
"},"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/TagBar":{"_active":"on","_debug":"off","_edittag":"on","_tagpopup":"off","_tagtable":"on","created":"20140905024853346","creator":"EucalyJ","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags","modified":"20140921091502881","modifier":"EucalyJ","taggroup":"$:/plugins/eucaly $:/_doc-type $:/_doc-edition toc","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate $:/_UI $:/_popuptagger $:/_macros","title":"$:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger/TagBar","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","view-filter":"[all[tiddlers+shadows]regexp:creator[eucaly(?i)]]","text":"<>"}}}
author: EucalyJ
creator: EucalyJ
description: PopupTagger - TagBar / TagTable with popup list of tags
title: $:/plugins/eucaly/popuptagger
name: popuptagger
